com.github.bordertech.wcomponents

Class WImageEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.AbstractWComponent
      • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.WImageEditor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WComponent, WebComponent, Serializable

    public class WImageEditor
extends AbstractWComponent

    EXPERIMENTAL API WARNING - this API is under development and is likely to change. The WImageEditor component provides a means for allowing the user to edit images and submit the result. The edited image may be pre-existing and provided as a WImage or newly acquired (upload or camera).

    Since:
    1.0.3
    Author:
    Rick Brown
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getOverlayUrl

        public String getOverlayUrl()
        Returns:
        the overlay image URL.

      • setOverlayUrl

        public void setOverlayUrl(String overlayUrl)
        Sets the overlay image URL. An overlay image is rendered on top of the image being edited (but does not form part of the saved image).
        Parameters:
        overlayUrl - the overlay image URL.

      • getUseCamera

        public boolean getUseCamera()
        Returns:
        true if the image editor should allow camera image acquisition.

      • setUseCamera

        public void setUseCamera(boolean useCamera)
        Set to true if you wish to allow the user to capture an image from an attached camera. This feature is completely dependent on browser support and will essentially be ignored if the browser does not provide the necessary APIs.
        Parameters:
        useCamera - the overlay image URL.

      • getIsFace

        public boolean getIsFace()
        Returns:
        true if the image editor includes face detection.

      • setIsFace

        public void setIsFace(boolean isFace)
        Set to true to turn on face detection.
        Parameters:
        isFace - turn face detection on or off.

      • getSize

        public Dimension getSize()
        Retrieve the editor size.

        Returns the size set via setSize(Dimension).

        Returns:
        the size of the image editor.

      • setSize

        public void setSize(Dimension size)
        Parameters:
        size - the size of the image editor.

      • getComponentModel

        protected WImageEditor.ImageEditModel getComponentModel()
        Returns the effective component model for this component. Subclass may override this method to narrow the return type to their specific model type.
        Overrides:
        getComponentModel in class AbstractWComponent
        Returns:
        the effective component model

      • getOrCreateComponentModel

        protected WImageEditor.ImageEditModel getOrCreateComponentModel()
        Retrieves the model for this component so that it can be modified. If this method is called during request processing, and a session specific model does not yet exist, then a new model is created. Subclasses may override this method to narrow the return type to their specific model type.
        Overrides:
        getOrCreateComponentModel in class AbstractWComponent
        Returns:
        the model for this component
